law.catch_line: Illegal beverages -- No property rights in -- Exception -- Destruction.

text.section: No property rights other than those in the court of appropriate jurisdiction pursuant to KRS 244.195 shall exist in any alcoholic beverages obtained, possessed, held or used in violation of this chapter.
The court, upon conviction of the person arrested, shall order the alcoholic beverages to be destroyed by the sheriff for the county in which the alcoholic beverages were seized.

law.history: Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 132, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 194, sec. 8, effective June 17, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2554c-27.
